GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: royal dryad
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: The dryad caste is universal. They can play both a defensive role and an aggressive one, providing significant support in combat. Unlike ordinary dryads, they grow and become stronger with each year of life (up to 2 years).

GauranlenTreeModeDef.label: abyss wolf dryad
GauranlenTreeModeDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in aggression and damage-dealing attacks. The abyss wolf is so named because their usual habitat is deep underground. They are not very durable in close combat, but their attacks are deadly to opponents without resistance to corruption.
